name: Psycho Spoon Demo
description:
This is only a demo of a game we are working on, called Psycho Spoon. Hope you'll enjoy it

You move with the arrowkeys or A and D

Use the plate with E, and you can recall it with F or R

The Blue Soup gives you speedboost but only for a certain  amount of time, the green one jumpboost, but only if you jump on the plate.

If you press Esc, a pause menu comes up, where you can restart the level or go back to the title screen.

Buttonpromt grafics by: @xelubest (twitter)
